Sentence.sentence: What the designers of American sportswear proved was that fashion is a genuine design art, answering to the demanding needs of service.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Why, then, has this claim become so popular?Part of the answer is that this is what always happens during periods of high unemployment—in part because experts and analysts believe that declaring the problem deeply rooted, with no easy answers, makes them sound serious.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When I was in high school, dozens in my class alone would have answered differently.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: What can be done about mass unemployment? All the wise heads agree: there're no quick or easy answers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The answer is that no one has an easy fix for rising medical costs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Saying that there're no easy answers sounds wise, but it's actually foolish: our unemployment crisis could be cured very quickly if we had the intellectual clarity and political will to act.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Those simultaneous challenges appear less  overwhelming with increasingly better answers to a centuries-old question: how to make power portable.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And it is hard not to think: Are we in an innovation lull ( ' ,  间歇期 )?In some ways, the answer is yes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We found that when we taught participants to ask What if? and How can? questions that nobody present would know the answer to and that would spark exploration, they engaged in better inquiry at the next exhibit − asking more questions, performing more experiments and making better inter pretations of their results.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It helps students realize not every question has an answer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: For some people, mass transit might answer all transportation needs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Fathers answered differently:75 percent preferred full-time work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: With the teacher's help, these pupils were able to find the answers to their set of problems.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Smith's essays raise as many questions as they answer.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We're trying to get answers from the students.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We learn from the answer that a student who gets a 100 should still work hard and keep improving.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The writers of Generation O (short for Obama), a new Newsweek blog that seeks to chronicle the lives of a group of young Obama supporters, want to answer that question
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He answered Dona's questions very well.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: When these people ran up against a technical problem, to which they'd have to turn to someone else for an answer, they'd e-mail and get an answer right away, because they built up a network of people before they needed them
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The other people would e-mail and wait up to two weeks for an answer
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why he refused to answer her call.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: After outlining the main points she would cover, she assured the audience that she would be happy to answer questions at the end of her presentation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Delia had anticipated this question and had an answer ready
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She answered in a matter-of-fact way.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Oh, I will," he answered politely
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Based on answers to questions regarding their job hunting strategies and career decisions, he divided the students into two groups: maximizers, who consider every possible option, and satisficers, who look until they find an option that is good enough.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: If you've ever started a sentence with, "If I were you…" or found yourself scratching your head at a colleague's agony over a decision when the answer is crystal-clear, there's a scientific reason behind it.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In some ways, the answer is yes.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Part of the answer is that this is what always happens during periods of high unemployment—in part because experts and analysts believe that declaring the problem deeply rooted, with no easy answers, makes them sound serious.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Thanks for taking the time to answer my questions, professor.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The answer depends on the robot.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The answer depends on which component happens to be stronger.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Those are the questions we need to ask ourselves, and everyone can have a different answer.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"回答"之意。
means: answer ：常用词，指用书面、口头或行动对他人的请求、询问、质问等作出回答或反应。
reply ：较正式用词，较少用于口语。侧重经过考虑的较正式答复。
respond ：正式用词，指即刻的，以口头或行动对外来的号召、请求或刺激等作出回答或响应。
retort ：指对不同意见、批评或控诉作出迅速、有力的回答，即"反驳"。
return ：正式用词，从本义"归来，回去"引申作"回答、答辨"讲时，含反驳或反唇相讥之意。

list.explanation: [贬义词](给提问者的)答复是否定的

example.en: A: " Has the new film received any praise?" B: "I could only say the answer is a lemon.
example.zh: 甲: "对这部新影片有人说好吗？" 乙: "我只能说，回答是否定的。"

Sentence.sentence: As soon as you get the answer you need, move on to the next person.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: He always answered, "Son, if you want to catch a fish, you have to think like a fish", I remember being even more upset then because, "I'm not a fish!" I didn't know how to think like a fish.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语广东卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: I guess the answer is, we were fighting for survival, protecting and providing for those we loved.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: If everyone is giving you the same answer, you won't be able to use it.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: If the answer to all those questions is yes, you had better control your stress, as you probably are under more stress than is good for you.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 语法填空 B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Looking back on your day, you will find it hard to deny that a horseback safari is as close as you will ever come to answering the call of the wild.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Make sure that as you go from interview to interview, you are getting a variety of answers.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: My husband answered it while I was on the phone in the dining room.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Read the syllabus and learning management system information to be sure the answer isn't hiding in plain sight.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Researchers have found the final answers to the problem.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: Right now, the answer is: not very easily.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: So far there is no effective way to get rid of it, but a new study suggests an answer may lie in the stomachs of some hungry worms.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Some researchers argue that we can seal the machines inside a kind of firewall, using them to answer difficult questions.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: That number of interviews should give you all the answers you need.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The professor would actually like to see you and answer your questions.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 主旨概括 原文

Sentence.sentence: The robot doesn't just deliver general answers to questions; it responds based on what it learns about each individual in the household.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: There is no need to tell me your answer now.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When his phone rang again later, he left his seat to answer it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Overdressed is the fashion world’s answer to consumer-activist bestsellers like Michael Pollan’s The Omnivore’s Dilemma.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Ask anyone newly unemployed what they want and the answer is always: a job.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Ms Brooks may or may not have had suspicions about how her journalists got their stories, but she asked no questions, gave no instructions—nor received traceable, recorded answers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Researchers admit that their study does not answer the question of how much businesses ought to spend on CSR.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps that is why we explore the starry skies, as if answering a primal calling to know ourselves and our true ancestral homes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Calls to disassemble all telescopes on Mauna Kea or to ban future development there ignore the reality that astronomy and Hawaiian culture both seek to answer big questions about who we are, where we come from and where we are going.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A recent paper, titled "The Natural Selection of Bad Science", published on the Royal Society's open science website, attempts to answer this intriguing and important question.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）翻译 Section Ⅲ

Sentence.sentence: Mechanization isn't the answer, either—not yer, at least.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: One answer is fear, according to Jon Wortmann, an executive mental coach.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Overdressed is the fashion world's answer to consumer-activist bestsellers like Michael Pollan's The Omnivore's dilemma.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Such actions to seek knowledge and to understand what information we already knew were captured by the Latin phrase "sapere aude" or "dare to know", after Immanuel Kant used it in his essay An Answer to the Question: What is Enlightenment?
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The answer, says Dr Kroo, lies with birds.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The new research reveals that the need to know is so strong that people will seek to satisfy their curiosity even when it is clear the answer will hurt.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

means.word_mean: 答复; 解答; 答辩

sentences.en: I asked him a question but he would not answer.
sentences.cn: 我问了他一个问题, 但是他不作回答。

sentences.en: I telephoned this afternoon, but nobody answered.
sentences.cn: 我今天下午打过电话, 但没人接。

sentences.en: He answered that he knew nothing about it.
sentences.cn: 他回答说关于此事他一无所知。

sentences.en: He answered, “It's two o'clock.
sentences.cn: ”他回答说“现在两点。”

means.word_mean: 适应, 符合, 满足

sentences.en: It answers very well.
sentences.cn: 这完全适用。

sentences.en: Our work must answer the specifications laid down.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作应符合所定的规范。

sentences.en: The workers answered by calling a strike.
sentences.cn: 工人举行罢工进行回击。

sentences.en: Three fire companies answered the alarm.
sentences.cn: 听到警报后, 三个消防队都来了。

sentences.en: Facts are the best answers.
sentences.cn: 事实是最好的回答。

sentences.en: We often learn foreign language through questions and answers.
sentences.cn: 我们常用问答的方式学外语。

sentences.en: Have you had an answer to your letter?
sentences.cn: 你收到回信了吗?

sentences.en: You can find the answers of all the exercises at the end of this book.
sentences.cn: 在这本书后面, 你可以找到所有习题的答案。

sentences.en: It's the answer to your question.
sentences.cn: 这就是你的问题的答案。

sentences.en: A nod was her only answer.
sentences.cn: 点了下头是她仅有的反应。

sentences.en: The publication comes as the answer to an acute demand.
sentences.cn: 这一出版物是为满足急需而出版的。

means.word_mean: 足以媲美的人；堪称相当的事物</seg>

data.mean: （试题、练习等的）答案，正确答案
足以媲美的人；堪称相当的事物
answer for sth 担保，保证（某人的品质等）
answer back 为自己辩护；答辩

sentence.cn: 那么多的面试会给你所有你需要的答案。
sentence.en: That number of interviews should give you all the answers you need.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 选项

sentence.cn: 阅读课程提纲和学习管理系统信息，以确保答案一目了然。
sentence.en: Read the syllabus and learning management system information to be sure the answer isn't hiding in plain sight.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 七选五 原文

mean.mean: （试题、练习等的）答案，正确答案

jx.jx_en_mean: correspond to a description, especially one of a suspect issued by the police
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指警察对嫌疑犯的描述）描述相符

lj.lj_ly: an attractive woman answering to the name of Suzanne.
lj.lj_ls: 芳名苏珊娜的妩媚女人。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be confident in one's knowledge of something, typically without justification
as a response to or as a result of

lj.lj_ly: I hurried along the passage in answer to the doorbell's ring.
lj.lj_ls: 听到门铃响我匆匆穿过走道去开门。

entry.def: When you answer someone who has asked you something, you say something back to them.

example.ex: I knew Ben was lying when he answered me...
example.tran: 我知道本回答我时在撒谎。

example.ex: Just answer the question...
example.tran: 只回答问题。

entry.def: An answer is something that you say when you answer someone.

example.ex: Without waiting for an answer, he turned and went in through the door...
example.tran: 未等答复，他就转身进了门。

example.ex: I don't quite know what to say in answer to your question.
example.tran: 我不太清楚如何回答你的问题。

entry.def: If you say that someone will not take no for an answer, you mean that they go on trying to make you agree to something even after you have refused.
entry.tran: 接受反对意见;接受拒绝

example.ex: She is tough, unwilling to take no for an answer...
example.tran: 她很强硬，不达目的誓不罢休。

example.ex: He would never take no for an answer.
example.tran: 他从来都坚持己见。

entry.def: If you answer a letter or advertisement, you write to the person who wrote it.

example.ex: Did he answer your letter?...
example.tran: 他给你回信了吗？

example.ex: She answered an advert for a job as a cook.
example.tran: 她看到一则招聘厨师的广告后写信应征。

entry.def: An answer is a letter that you write to someone who has written to you.

example.ex: I wrote to him but I never had an answer back...
example.tran: 我写了信给他，但一直没收到回信。

example.ex: She wrote to Roosevelt's secretary in answer to his letter of the day before.
example.tran: 她写了信给罗斯福的秘书，回复罗斯福前一天的来信。

entry.def: When you answer the telephone, you pick it up when it rings. When you answer the door, you open it when you hear a knock or the bell.

example.ex: She answered her phone on the first ring...
example.tran: 电话刚一响，她就接了。

example.ex: A middle-aged woman answered the door.
example.tran: 一个中年妇女应声开了门。

entry.def: An answer to a problem is a solution to it.

example.ex: There are no easy answers to the problems facing the economy...
example.tran: 解决经济所面临的问题并非易事。

example.ex: Prison is not the answer for most young offenders...
example.tran: 就大多数年轻的犯法者来说，把他们关进监狱不是解决问题的办法。

entry.def: Someone's answer to a question in a test or quiz is what they write or say in an attempt to give the facts that are asked for. The answer to a question is the fact that was asked for.

example.ex: Simply marking an answer wrong will not help the pupil to get future examples correct...
example.tran: 仅仅在答案上打叉号不会有助于学生做对日后的题目。

example.ex: Below are printed the answers to the Brain of Soccer 1993 quiz.
example.tran: 以下所印的是1993年“脑力足球”小测验的答案。

entry.def: When you answer a question in a test or quiz, you write or say something in an attempt to give the facts that are asked for.

example.ex: To obtain her degree, she answered 81 questions over 10 papers.
example.tran: 为获得学位，她回答了10页纸上的81个问题。

entry.def: Your answer to something that someone has said or done is what you say or do in response to it or in defence of yourself.

example.ex: In answer to speculation that she wouldn't finish the race, she boldly declared her intention of winning it.
example.tran: 为了回应她会中途退赛的猜测，她大胆地宣布她要赢得这场比赛。

entry.def: If you answer something that someone has said or done, you respond to it.

example.ex: He answered her smile with one of his own...
example.tran: 他对她的微笑回以同礼。

example.ex: That statement seemed designed to answer criticism of allied bombing missions.
example.tran: 那份声明似乎是专门就联合轰炸任务的批评作出反击。

entry.def: If you say that something is a place's answer to a famous thing, you mean that the first thing is the equivalent of the second in that place.
entry.tran: （某地）与…相似的东西，相当于…的东西

example.ex: Cachaca is Brazil's answer to tequila.
example.tran: 巴西甜酒相当于是巴西的龙舌兰酒。

entry.def: If something answers a need or purpose, it satisfies it, because it has the right qualities.
entry.tran: 满足，适合，符合（需要、目的）

example.ex: We provide specially designed shopping trolleys to answer the needs of parents with young children.
example.tran: 我们提供特别设计的购物车，以满足带幼儿的父母的需要。

entry.def: If someone or something answers a particular description or answers to it, they have the characteristics described.

example.ex: Two men answering the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland...
example.tran: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。

example.ex: The Japanese never built any aircraft remotely answering to this description.
example.tran: 日本人从未制造过与此描述有丝毫相近的飞机。

means.word_mean: 1. a statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reply to a question or request or criticism or accusation;

sentences.sentence: "I waited several days for his answer"
"he wrote replies to several of his critics"

means.word_mean: 2. a statement that solves a problem or explains how to solve the problem;

sentences.sentence: "they were trying to find a peaceful solution"
"the answers were in the back of the book"
"he computed the result to four decimal places"

means.word_mean: 3. the speech act of replying to a question

4. the principle pleading by the defendant in response to plaintiff's complaint; in criminal law it consists of the defendant's plea of `guilty' or `not guilty' (or nolo contendere); in civil law it must contain denials of all allegations in the plaintiff'

sentences.sentence: "his answer to any problem was to get drunk"
"We answered that we would accept the invitation"

means.word_mean: 2. give the correct answer or solution to;

sentences.sentence: "The question concerning the meaning of life cannot be answered"

means.word_mean: 5. give a defence or refutation of (a charge) or in (an argument);

sentences.sentence: "The defendant answered to all the charges of the prosecution"

means.word_mean: 7. be sufficient; be adequate, either in quality or quantity;

sentences.sentence: "A 'B' grade doesn't suffice to get me into medical school"
"The drawing of the suspect answers to the description the victim gave"

means.word_mean: 9. be satisfactory for; meet the requirements of or serve the purpose of;
10. react to a stimulus or command;

sentences.sentence: "The steering of my new car answers to the slightest touch"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  andswaru (noun), andswarian (verb), of Germanic origin; from a base shared by swear

sentences.cn: 这项新研究表明，人们有强烈的求知欲，即使在他们知道答案会伤害到自己时，也会不断探索，以满足自己的好奇心
sentences.en: The new research reveals that the need to know is so strong that people will seek to satisfy their curiosity even when it is clear the answer will hurt.

sentences.cn: at the next exhibit — asking more questions, performing moreexperiments and making better interpretations of their results.研究发现，当我们引导参与者去问“假使……将会怎么样”和“怎么能……”这类现在没有人知道答案但能激发他们探索精神的问题时，他们会在下次展览活动中更好地参与探究，即提出更多的问题、做更多的试验、并且对他们的结果进行更合理的解释。
sentences.en: We found that when we taught participants to ask  “ What if? ” and  “ How can? ”questions that nobody present would know the answer to and that would  spark exploration, they engaged in better inquiry

sentences.en: Saying that there’re no easy answers sounds wise, but it’s actually foolish: our unemployment crisis could be cured very quickly if we had the intellectual clarity and political will to act.

sentences.cn: 那么，现在答案出炉了，尽管我很肯定，除了我所选的 那些国家，这些信息可能也同样正好符合很多国家。

sentences.cn: 一个特殊的问题实际上已经决定哪种答案是可接受的.
sentences.en: A specific question is actually a decision about the kind of answer that is acceptable.

sentences.cn: 那道问题有好几个答案.
sentences.en: That question had multiple answers.

sentences.cn: 答案究竟是什么看来还要等到播出的时候才能揭晓.
sentences.en: What is answer seems to wait until the broadcast time in order to be announced.

sentences.cn: 确定你们把答案誊写在准确的位置.
sentences.en: Make sure you put answer on the correct side.

sentences.cn: 所以,洪水是显见的答案.
sentences.en: So flooding is the obvious answer.

sentences.cn: 我开始拖延时间来猜测正确答案.
sentences.en: I was stalling for time to guess the correct answer.

sentences.cn: 大学考试题, 答案不用叙述体, 而是使用符号.
sentences.en: University exams, the answer no narration, instead, use a symbol.

sentences.cn: 只是刹那间, 一个答案浮现眼前.
sentences.en: Only a twinkling an eye, an answer surfacing.

sentences.cn: 在东南亚,答案是斩钉截铁的 “ 是 ”
sentences.en: The answer in Southeast Asia is definitely " yes "

sentences.cn: 回信；对广告作出反应
sentences.en: to answer a letter/an advertisement

sentences.cn: 接受、统计客户投诉,反应至相关经理进行调查并给予客户答复.
sentences.en: To receive and count customer's complaints andit to the appropriate manager for investigation and answer.

sentences.cn: 回答得很好啊. 她有什么反应?
sentences.en: H : those good answers. How did she react?

sentences.cn: 雇主对于此要求的反应就相当于员工会给出的答案了.
sentences.en: How an employer responds to this request as telling as the answers employees give.

sentences.cn: 但是毫无反应,连一声狗吠也没有.
sentences.en: But no voice answered her. Not even a dog barked.

sentences.cn: 我摩抚她,她没有反应; 我的歌唱也不能把她唤醒.
sentences.en: She answered not to my touch, my songs filed to arouse her.

sentences.cn: 我吃不准他会对如此直率的回答作出什么反应.
sentences.en: I am not sure how he will react to such a straightforward answer.

sentences.cn: 缰绳轻轻一动,这匹马就有反应.
sentences.en: The horse answers to the slightest pull on the rein.

sentences.cn: 这只船似乎对舵的转动的反应很不灵敏.
sentences.en: The boat seemed very slow to answer to any movement of the helm.

sentences.cn: 我的船长没有反应, 他的嘴唇惨白而寂静.
sentences.en: My Captain does not answer, his lips are pale and still.

sentences.cn: 每当 霍亚 的刺拳出击, 梅威瑟都没有反应.
sentences.en: Every time ( De La Hoya ) threw the left jab, Mayweather had no answer.

sentences.cn: 只要缰绳轻轻一拉,马就作出反应.
sentences.en: The horse answered to the slightest pull on the rein.

sentences.cn: 他向她道晚安,而她却毫无反应.
sentences.en: He said good night to her but she gave no answer.

sentences.cn: 这些问题常常涉及动态问题,如一种酶促进何种化学反应,或这种酶能提高反应速度多少?
sentences.en: They adapt proven methodologies to kinds of materials or to answer new questions about their composition.

sentences.cn: 他反应很快, 回答了记者提出的所有问题.
sentences.en: He had a quick mind, and answered all the questions put to him by the reporter.

sentences.cn: 点了下头是她仅有的反应.
sentences.en: A nod was her only answer.

sentences.cn: 这个反应促使我们去尝试回答它.
sentences.en: That reaction causes us to try and answer it.

sentences.cn: 狗听到叫它会有反应.
sentences.en: The dog answers to his name.

sentences.cn: 回声很少反应西德尼-卡尔顿的实际脚步.
sentences.en: The echoes rarely answered to the actual tread of Sydney Carton.

sentences.cn: 他们的反应是起诉我.
sentences.en: Their answer was to sue me.

sentences.cn: 要是他对门铃的反应像他对电话的反应一样, 我可能要在这敲一天呢.
sentences.en: If he answered his door the way he answers his phone, this may take all day.

Sentence.sentence: Leigh Thompson of Kellogg School of Management in Illinois warns that, Teams are not always the answer—teams may provide insight, creativity and knowledge in a way that a person working independently cannot; but teamwork may also lead to confusion, delay and poor decision-making.

Sentence.sentence: Is it possible to enjoy a peaceful life in a world that is increasingly challenged by threats and uncertainties from wars, terrorism, economic crises and a widespread outbreak of infectious diseases? The answer is yes, according to a new book The 10 Golden Rules: Ancient Wisdom from the Greek Philosophers on Living a Good Life.
